nodes.documentation:
@author Karen Suen
@title Stores and manages all listings in marketplace
This contract provides getters and setters for storing, accessing and
modifying listings created in the marketplace. Basic security checks are
implemented to prevent unauthorized use of functions e.g. only the seller
of the listing can modify the listing or the listing must be in available
state to be sold.
nodes.name: MarketStore

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Only the seller of this listing can disable it"

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "The listing cannot be disabled during a transaction"

arguments.value: The listing cannot be disabled during a transaction

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "The listing cannot be disabled during a transaction"

nodes.name: createListingInStore
disableListing

nodes.documentation:
@notice To sell a listing, update the given listing to SOLD state
@param _id The id of listing to sell
nodes.name: listingSold

nodes.documentation:
@dev Update the given listing to available state
@param _id The id of listing to make available in marketplace

@dev Returns a list of all listing id's created by an address

devdoc.author: Karen Suen

createListingInStore(uint256,string,stri.details: The unique ID of each listing is auto generated using the incremented total listing count. The list of seller's owned listings are also updated.

params._desc: The string description of the new listing
params._image: The file hash of photo provided for new listing
params._price: The selling price of the new listing
params._seller: The seller address that created this listing (owner)
params._title: The string title of the new listing

disableListing(uint256).details: Sold or disabled listings could be activated again (relisted)

params._id: The id of listing to disable

getAllSellerListings(address).details: Returns a list of all listing id's created by an address

params._seller: The account to retrieve all listing ids for

getListing(uint256).details: The listing state enum value is returned as an integer

params._id: The id of listing to return

getListingState(uint256).details: Returns the current state of a listing as an integer

params._id: The id of listing to retrieve the state of

listingAvailable(uint256).details: Update the given listing to available state

params._id: The id of listing to make available in marketplace
The id of listing to sell

devdoc.title: Stores and manages all listings in marketplace This contract provides getters and setters for storing, accessing and modifying listings created in the marketplace. Basic security checks are implemented to prevent unauthorized use of functions e.g. only the seller of the listing can modify the listing or the listing must be in available state to be sold.

createListingInStore(uint256,string,stri.notice: Create a new listing in the marketplace and returns its id

disableListing(uint256).notice: Disable the given listing by updating its state to INACTIVE

getListing(uint256).notice: Returns all information about a listing in the marketplace as a tuple

listingSold(uint256).notice: To sell a listing, update the given listing to SOLD state
